sys_ui_message.message:
ABSA has taken a strong stance against Covid-19.
Our Covid -19 policies and procedures are as follows: 1. Should you have any COVID-19 / Flu-like symptoms please advise our consultant and reschedule your appointment 2. Wearing of facial masks is mandatory 3. All clients' temperature will be recorded and client will be required to complete the COVID- 19 screening questionnaire 4. Hands will be sanitized on entry, during and after signature of documentation / consultation 5. Strict social distancing measure to be adhered to 6. All regulations published by the COVID-19 Command Centre must be strictly complied with at all times.
